response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $150 to me. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you for $180. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also my desire to ensure you receive the best possible experience with our product. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly special. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in yourself and quality.", "product_price": 180}
